page.title: 15THREE GENERATIONS III
page.content: Mr. Strong's Grandson, Timothy Foster was born at the Royal United Hospital Bath l.June.l970. He has one younger sister Alison. At the age of 4 Tim started at Swainswick School,he travelled there by mini bus.There were l7 pupils in a mixed class, 3 women teahcers and the Headteacher taught the top class. The School now has 3 classrooms, a proper playground and hot dinners brought daily from a Central Kitchen. At the age of ll Tim moved to Beechen Cliff Comprehensive Boys School,Bath. He enjoys a much bigger school where he is able to learn many interesting subjects. He hopes to leave School at l8 and become an industrial chemist. His sister Alison also went to Swains _wick school and at the age of ll left to attend Hayesfield Comprehensive Girls School, Bath.
